title: GET_ENTITY_FORWARD_VECTOR
content:
0x0A794A5A57F8DF910x84DCECBF// GetEntityForwardVector
Vector3 GET_ENTITY_FORWARD_VECTOR(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the forward vector for.Returns: The forward vector.Gets the entity's forward vector.
codeBlocks:
local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_ENTITY_FORWARD_VECTOR
GetEntityForwardVector(entity)
